equipment.name: Backpack
equipment.description: Carries up to 20 kg of gear comfortably.

equipment.name: Binoculars
equipment.description: Zoom optics with rangefinding. +1 to Recon in long range environments.

equipment.name: Field Kit
equipment.description: Basic camp tools, rations, water purifier, and small stove.

equipment.name: Grav Belt
equipment.description: Allows the user to fly short distances at walking speed.

equipment.name: Lockpicks
equipment.description: Tools and electronics used to bypass locks. Used with Mechanics or Electronics.

equipment.name: Medkit
equipment.description: +1 DM to Medic checks to stabilize or treat injury.

equipment.name: Portable Computer
equipment.description: Handheld system with programmable AI. May run software.

equipment.name: Rope (20m)
equipment.description: Strong enough for climbing or securing cargo.

equipment.name: Tool Kit
equipment.description: Required for repair and maintenance tasks. Used with Mechanic.

equipment.name: Universal Translator
equipment.description: Real-time speech and text translation between most known languages.

equipment.name: Vacc Skin
equipment.description: Sealed environmental layer. Grants minimal vacuum protection (1 hr air).

equipment.name: Tent
equipment.description: Shelter for two. Durable against basic environments.

equipment.name: Air Filter Mask
equipment.description: Grants +1 DM to END checks against airborne hazards.

equipment.name: Radiation Badge
equipment.description: Changes color to indicate dangerous radiation levels.

medical_gear.name: Medkit
medical_gear.description: Standard medical kit. Grants +1 DM to Medic checks for first aid and stabilization.

medical_gear.name: AutoDoc
medical_gear.description: Automated surgical unit. Can perform most procedures autonomously. Grants +2 DM to Medic checks when used correctly.

medical_gear.name: First Aid Pack
medical_gear.description: Basic emergency pack for minor injuries. Used for quick stabilization.

medical_gear.name: Surgical Tools
medical_gear.description: Precise instruments used in operating procedures. Required for complex surgery.

medical_gear.name: Anagathics
medical_gear.description: Slows aging process. Regular use required. Illegal or restricted on many worlds.

medical_gear.name: Life Support System
medical_gear.description: Used to keep a patient stable and breathing for extended periods. Often installed in hospitals or vehicles.

medical_gear.name: Antirad
medical_gear.description: Medication to reduce radiation damage. Grants bonus to END checks against radiation exposure.

comms_and_scanners.name: Hand Computer
comms_and_scanners.description: Portable, wrist-mounted computer system. Supports various apps and software.

comms_and_scanners.name: Communicator (Short Range)
comms_and_scanners.description: Basic personal comms, range approx. 5 km line of sight. Voice-only.

comms_and_scanners.name: Communicator (Medium Range)
comms_and_scanners.description: Enhanced communication range of 50 km, includes audio and encrypted data.

comms_and_scanners.name: Communicator (Long Range)
comms_and_scanners.description: Satellite relays enable global or orbital communications.

comms_and_scanners.name: CommDot
comms_and_scanners.description: Tiny implant or stick-on patch allowing low-volume, short-range secure communication.

comms_and_scanners.name: Sensor Pack
comms_and_scanners.description: Portable scanning device with motion, heat, and EM sensors. Useful for Recon or Science.

comms_and_scanners.name: Field Sensor
comms_and_scanners.description: Worn or mounted sensor suite for atmospheric or terrain scanning. Often used in Survey or Scout roles.

comms_and_scanners.name: Bioscanner
comms_and_scanners.description: Medical scanner for biological signatures and lifeform detection.

comms_and_scanners.name: Radiation Detector
comms_and_scanners.description: Alerts user to radiation sources and levels. Grants +2 DM to detect radiation.

comms_and_scanners.name: Infrared Goggles
comms_and_scanners.description: Allows user to see heat signatures in total darkness. Useful in stealth and recon.

survival_gear.name: Survival Tent
survival_gear.description: Compact shelter for two individuals. Insulated for most environments.

survival_gear.name: Filter Mask
survival_gear.description: Protects against smoke, dust, and common airborne toxins.

survival_gear.name: Vacc Suit
survival_gear.description: Pressurized suit for vacuum environments. Armor 8.

survival_gear.name: Cold Weather Clothing
survival_gear.description: Heavy insulation for frigid environments. +2 to END checks vs cold.

survival_gear.name: Desert Robes
survival_gear.description: Protects against heatstroke and dehydration in desert environments. +2 to END checks vs heat.

survival_gear.name: Survival Kit
survival_gear.description: Contains rations, fire starter, water purifier, emergency beacon, and tools for foraging or shelter building.

survival_gear.name: Grav Chute
survival_gear.description: Controlled descent parachute for atmospheric drops from orbit or high altitude.

survival_gear.name: Emergency Beacon
survival_gear.description: Sends distress signal across planetary surface or to orbital ships. Battery lasts 48 hours.

survival_gear.name: Thermal Blanket
survival_gear.description: Mylar insulation used to preserve body heat. Common in medkits.

survival_gear.name: Water Purifier
survival_gear.description: Removes biological and chemical contaminants from water sources.

survival_gear.name: Climbing Gear
survival_gear.description: Includes ropes, harnesses, pitons, and gloves. Required for mountaineering tasks.
